namuth ohu siwil samajaye poraki.ee nisa ohuta ariyas natha.ohu sayibaraya thula liyana kiyana de parinathaya yam hadarimak kara liyayi.mathalan wanneku ese nowe siwil samajaye ariyas godaki.ee nisama labuna intanet kanekshan eka wandurata kannadiyaki.ekata ekak paraspara adahas dakwim ,dawalta bhothikawadiwi rata adhyathmikawadiwim sidu wanne ehi prathipalayak lesayi.janapriya wennata oonama kunu harupayak liyanne ee nisaya.me wage intanet kanekshan walin pora wal wannata hadana godak bukiya ho blog pirimen soya gatha haka.dehi gediye sita pol bawa dakwa dewalwalin ledata beheth hoya gath bawa pawasana sayibar weddu,hina kala marena wargaye deshapalana wichara wihilu sapayana deshapalana wicharakayan pamanak nowa ridars dayajast wargaye sayibar sangarawala palawana dewal kiyawa ewwa saththamayi sitha liyana ( ara ganja lipiya wage) sayibar buddhimathun gana apa anukampa kala yuthuya.me ayidentiti krayisis ekaki.
